contentrichtext.text: '''Joseph Walker''' or '''Joe Walker''' may refer to: *[[Joseph Walker (British Army officer)]] (1890–1965), British Major-General *[[Joseph A. Walker]] (1921–1966), American test X-15 test pilot *[[Joseph Edison Walker]] (1879–1958), former president of the Universal Life Insurance Company *[[Joseph H. Walker]] (1829–1907), US Representative from Massachusetts, 1893–1899 *[[Joseph Marshall Walker]] (1784–1856), Governor of Louisiana, 1850s *[[Joseph R. Walker]] (1798–1876), explorer who blazed the Walker Pass Trail into California *[[Private Joe Walker]], a character from the British television sitcom ''Dad's Army'' *[[Joseph A. Walker (playwright)]] (1935–2003), American playwright *[[Joseph W. Walker]] (born 1952), karate practitioner and instructor *[[Joseph Walker (cinematographer)]] (1892–1985), Hollywood director of photography during the 1930s and 40s *[[Joe Walker (novelist)]] (1910–1971), Australian novelist and union organiser *[[Joe Walker (private detective)]] a fictional New York Private Investigator of the Kommissar X book and film series *[[Joseph Walker (attorney)]], one of the original 34 signatories to the [[Humanist Manifesto]] *[[Joe Louis Walker]] (born 1949), American musician *Joe Walker (born 1987), member of theater group [[StarKid Productions]] *[[Joe Walker (editor)]], British film editor {{hndis|Walker, Joseph}}
